Name: Shylendra Sudamani
About: Results-driven and versatile Information Sciences and Technology graduate from Anna University, currently studying Data Science at UMass Dartmouth, and eager to gain hands-on experience in data science and software development. Focused on continuous learning, a passion for technology and the arts, and a strong ability to collaborate effectively and adapt to diverse team environments.

Work experience.Title: Software Intern
Responsibilities: Developed a Python web scraping project using elements like beautifulsoup and argparse
Scraped data from online shopping websites, including Amazon.com and Flipkart.com, enhancing data collection efficiency
Improved data collection rates significantly through optimized scraping techniques

Responsibilities: Utilized React JS to enhance the company website's functionality and user experience
Engineered key features to improve website performance and engagement
Managed regular maintenance and updates to ensure optimal website operation
Executed data analysis using Excel to track website metrics

Responsibilities: Facilitated meetings between departments to drive collaboration and decision-making
Conducted research on mental health issues and their social implications
Managed coordination and administration of cross-functional departments such as Technology, HR, Content, and Marketing
Analyzed survey data on mental health awareness using Excel

Projects.Title: RAG based chatbot app
Projects.Description: Constructed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot that crawls entire websites respecting robots.txt. Enforced Llama 3.2 8B model in python to run locally. Embedded website HTML content using ChromaDB and Llama 3 8B, maintaining context via a sliding window approach. Implemented a full-stack system with user authentication and chat history stored via PostgreSQL. Achieved real-time query response with an average latency under 1.5 seconds.

Projects.Title: Deep Fake detection Engine
Projects.Description: Analyzed around 200,000 images from a Kaggle dataset for deepfake detection. Achieved 95%+ accuracy with no overfitting. Used VGG16 CNN for feature extraction and fine-tuning. Focused on computational efficiency while maintaining high accuracy. Relevant for security, media integrity, and ethical AI applications.

Projects.Title: Credit risk Analysis using Machine Learning
Projects.Description: Conducted credit risk analysis using machine learning techniques on a dataset containing over 700 records. Built and evaluated multiple machine learning models including Random Forest Classifier (79.2% accuracy), Support Vector Classifier (82.1% accuracy), and Logistic Regression (83.5% accuracy). Optimized model selection by analyzing metrics such as precision, recall, and F1-score.

Projects.Title: IoT and Machine Learning Based Calorie Management System
Projects.Description: Developed an AI-powered calorie management system. Used Tableau for data analysis. Employed deep learning to identify foods and calculate calories using images (78% accuracy). Integrated IoT using Raspberry Pi to create a smart cycle that tracks calories burnt (~85% accuracy). Applied ML algorithms for personalized diet recommendations.

Projects.Title: Gesture controlled drone
Projects.Description: Developed a program to control a wireless drone using gestures. Implemented a key-point classification algorithm using Keras (94% accuracy). Leveraged mediapipe to identify gestures and map them to drone movements.

Projects.Title: Stock market prediction system
Projects.Description: Implemented LSTM and SVR regression models on Tesla stocks dataset (MSE 273/325, R^2 0.87/0.93). Applied LSTM to SNP500 stocks database. Created a streamlit web app for 30-day predictions.

Certification.Title: Learn how to build an AI
